examples: Crepidomanes proliferum var. minutum (Blume) C.A.Hameed ex Easa, Biodivers. Doc. Kerala Part 5, Pteridophytes: 42 (2003). 'B' example: Taxilejeunea indica A.Agarwal ex Easa in Kerala Forest Research Handbook 17: 1-47. (2003)
